Dear Prank:
Wherever you are and whatever you are doing, please
give this your immediate attention. We need your thinking
very badly because you have been in the organization a
long time and have worked as hard as any broadcaster in
the country.
On a page completely apart from your reactions to
the enclosed questions, I should like to have your suggestions
for a Committee of Three, including myself. I shall not put
your name on the Committee for the simple reason that
somebody might say the University of Illinois would swing too
much influence. I shall expect to confer with you, as well
as Schramm and the Foundation, however, and certainly want
your best thinking as we go along. We will, of course,
meet on your campus for this Committee meeting. It goes
without saying that your suggestions for the Committee will
be kept confidential.
Please let me have your reactions by return
airmail.
Sincerely yours,
/s/ Graydon
Graydon Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Vice-President, NAEB
